title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Oak Bottom tent campgrounds, Brandy Creek RV, Dry Creek Campground and primitive campsites are available. There is no lodging in Whiskeytown NRA. A number of year-round resorts, hotels, bed and breakfasts, inns, motels are available. Please make reservations well in advance during peak seasons.  No food, restaurants or facilities are located within the park. A number of businesses are nearby in local towns and in Redding, CA.
